name: TI_1_8_1_Redact_Patient_Identifying_Information
title: TI.1.8.1 Redact Patient Identifying Information (Function)
description: Maintain patient identities and conditions invisible to the public and other providers who do not have “need to know” on public tracking screens.
purpose: A number of systems implement large tracking screens, common displays or dashboards to support workflows. In these applications, there is a need to create de-identified views for broadcast in common areas.

statement.label: TI.1.8.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to manage redaction of patient identities on publicly viewable status boards according to organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.
